thread.title: BREAKING: Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon to Reopen This Weekend Following Hurricane Milton
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon to Reopen This Weekend Following Hurricane Milton

author: Brit Tuttle
title: BREAKING: Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon to Reopen This Weekend Following Hurricane Milton
text: Walt Disney World Resort has announced a reopening date for Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon water park following its temporary closure due to Hurricane Milton. Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon Reopening Walt Disney World shared the news on its [Weather Updates webpage](https://disneyworld.disney.go.com/experience-updates/weather-updates/): Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon water park is expected to reopen to all Guests on Saturday, October 12. Disney’s Blizzard Beach water park remains closed for planned refurbishment. At this time, all four Walt Disney World theme parks, Disney Springs, and mini-golf courses have [reopened ](https://wdwnt.com/2024/10/walt-disney-world-reopen-hurricane-milton/)and resumed normal operations. [Limited park reservations are available](https://wdwnt.com/2024/10/walt-disney-world-reopens-hurricane-milton/) today for guests with theme park tickets; park reservations are unavailable for Annual Passholders. For now, the only operational impacts are that Disney’s Fort Wilderness Resort & Campground and the Treehouse Villas at Disney’s Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa [remain closed](https://wdwnt.com/2024/10/disney-close-fort-wilderness-hurricane-milton/). Guests are encouraged to check back for updates on a reopening timeline. Walt Disney World Resort [closed early](https://wdwnt.com/2024/10/walt-disney-world-closures-hurricane-milton/) on October 9 and [remained closed through October 10](https://wdwnt.com/2024/10/breaking-walt-disney-world-remain-closed-hurricane-milton/) due to Hurricane Milton. This included Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon, Disney Springs, the Disney Springs parking garages, and the two miniature golf courses. Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Party was [cancelled ](https://wdwnt.com/2024/10/mickeys-not-so-scary-halloween-party-canceled-for-hurricane-milton/)on October 10, with event tickets refunded. See more of our coverage from this week for [Hurricane Milton](https://wdwnt.com/?s=hurricane+milton). For the latest Disney Parks news and info, follow [WDW News Today](https://wdwnt.com/) on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/wdwnt), [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/WDWNewsToday/), and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/wdwnt/).
